name: Chromasia
description:
~CHROMASIA~

~Experience the soon to be classic SRPG, now on Windows, Linux, Macs, & Steam Machines!~


Chromasia, a new turn-based strategy RPG, explores the middle ages in the world of rocks papers and scissors. You will discover a unique and slightly dark, mature story of vengeance, and murder. The challenging campaign delivers a story of vengeance, doubt, and loss. You decide the course of the story at key turning points and determine its outcome. Players will immerse themselves in the epic struggle for the truth, as the fate of the world lies in the hands of Psy and the members of your platoon.



Key Features
• Beautiful pixel battlefields

• Amazing sound track

• Steam trading cards

• Full mouse/keyboard and gamepad support

• Recruit new soldiers generated randomly with nearly endless possibilities

• More than 16 unique maps provide a beautiful look into the world.

• More than 25 unique battle stages provide challenges that can be easy to hard depending on your choices.

• Make sure you have plenty of snacks, as this colorful fantasy adventure has 25+ hours of breath taking play time.

• You take control of your three main characters and recruit nearly endless others to claim glorious victory or devastating defeat.

• Dish out some serious damage with more than 15 special abilities ... or find yourself on the other end and be destroyed.
